title: Episode 16 -  Zetta Elliott with Shannon Gibney
itunes:title: Zetta Elliott with Shannon Gibney
description: Author, playwright, and essayist Zetta Elliott talks with Shannon Gibney about her experiences with the publishing industry that eventually led to the creation of her own independent imprint Rosetta Press. She has published over 20 books for children and young adults, and her plays have been staged across the country. For more information, visit her website www.zettaelliott.com
